Klasse LogConfigurator

java.lang.Object
org.oxt.toolbox.helpers.LogConfigurator
public class LogConfigurator extends Object
Class to initialize custom logger using configuration file at ./resources/log4j2.xml.
Seit:
1.1.2
Autor:
Dr. Jan C. Thiele
